markdownRemark.html:
Finally, here’s the second of three doses on why accessibility is important. Part one focused on definining “disability” as a term and shedding light on the people who are categorized within it. Part two is here to look at “accessibility” as a term and the people who benefit from it being applied (spoilers: it’s everyone).

Read “Why is accessibility important?” — Part 2 on the HealthHub Design blog.
